00026 #include "MainWindow_UI.hpp"
00027 
00028 namespace RoteSonne {
00029   namespace UI {
00030     namespace Widgets {
00031 
00032       // --------------------------------------------------------------------
00033       // Public methods
00034       // --------------------------------------------------------------------
00035 
00036       MainWindow_UI::MainWindow_UI() {
00037         // load UI resource file.
00038         this -> widget = LoadUI::loadUI(":/forms/ui/mainWindow.ui");
00039 
00040         // attach handles.
00041         this -> addHandlers();
00042       }
00043 
00044       MainWindow_UI::~MainWindow_UI() {
00045       }
00046 
00047       QWidget * MainWindow_UI::getUI() const {
00048         return this -> widget;
00049       }
00050 
00051       // --------------------------------------------------------------------
00052       // Private methods
00053       // --------------------------------------------------------------------
00054 
00055       void MainWindow_UI::addHandlers() {
00056         // add "About Qt" handler
00057         connect(this -> widget -> findChild < QAction * > ("actionAbout_Qt"),
00058             SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(aboutQt()));
00059 
00060         // add "About" handler
00061         connect(this -> widget -> findChild < QAction * > ("actionAbout"),
00062             SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(about()));
00063 
00064         // add "Collection" handler
00065         connect(this -> widget -> findChild < QAction * > ("actionCollection"),
00066             SIGNAL(triggered()), this, SLOT(collectionPreferences()));
00067       }
00068 
00069       // --------------------------------------------------------------------
00070       // Slots
00071       // --------------------------------------------------------------------
00072 
00073       void MainWindow_UI::aboutQt() {
00074         QApplication::aboutQt();
00075       }
00076 
00077       void MainWindow_UI::about() {
00078         QWidget *widget = LoadUI::loadUI(":/forms/ui/aboutRoteSonne.ui");
00079         widget -> show();
00080       }
00081 
00082       void MainWindow_UI::collectionPreferences() {
00083         Collection_UI *collection = new Collection_UI(collection);
00084         collection -> show();
00085       }
00086     }
00087   }
00088 }
